body:
I apologize, I didn't quite follow your comment.
I was suggesting that instead of calling `TF_DeleteBuffer(csession_options)` in two places (once inside the `if (!throwExceptionIfNotOK(...` block and once in line 87, we could call it immediately after  invoking `TF_SetConfig`.
body_html:

I apologize, I didn't quite follow your comment.
